verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}“No condemnation!” precious word! Consider it, my soul! Thy sins were all on Jesus laid, His stripes have made thee whole.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Teach me, O God, to fix mine eyes On Christ, the spotless Lamb, So shall I love Thy precious will, And glorify His name.{/lang-eng}
